original_title: CT Scans malfunction across several government hospitals
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Government Radiological Technologists Association said 10 CT Scan devices in the government hospital system are non-operational.
Chairman of the Government Radiological Technologists Association Chanaka Dharmawickrama said that three other CT Scan devices cannot perform to its maximum capacity.
Sri Lanka's government hospital system has 43 CT Scan devices in total.
